text: aur jab paigambar ne apanee baaz beevee (hafasa) se chupake se koee baat kahee phir jab usane (baavajood mumaaniyat) us baat kee (aayasha ko) khabar de dee aur khuda ne is amr ko rasool par zaahir kar diya to rasool ne (aayasha ko) baaz baat (kissa maariya) jata dee aur baaz baat (kissae yahad) taal dee garaz jab rasool ne is vaaqiye (hafasa ke afashae raaz) ki us (aayasha) ko khabar dee to hairat se bol utheen aapako is baat (afashae raaz) kee kisane khabar dee rasool ne kaha mujhe bade vaaqifakaar khabaradaar (khuda) ne bata diya
